text: Hello
Hi
We are here to discuss the charity "Save the Children"
Okay sounds good
Not sure if you are aware but Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Yes I am aware. I have donated to them in the past. I feel so sorry for the children. And I think that people who donate are doing great things
Exactly! Now I plan on donating at least half of my $2 payment. Meaning $1.
I agree I will do the same
That's cool! This is how it'll happen. The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children
That is a wonderful thing that there doing
Yeah, it really is. I always try to donate when I can. Even at the grocery store when they ask if I want to donate to various charities.
Yep me too especially during xmas time. I wish i could donate more but maybe this year i will donate my  time and money
I will always donate at least a dollar. If I\'m spending my last few dollars, at that time, I can "afford" a dollar to someone who can not if the charity is legit.
Yeah a dollar would be great
We have to have three more back and forth "chats" for you and I to get paid AND the charity to get paid.
ok lets do it
So, you agree that you'll donate a dollar of your earnings here to this charity or do you want to donate more?
A dollar is fine by me
OK, so a dollar a piece it is, right? It's been a pleasure speaking with you today. By the way, I am in South Florida. Where are you?
Yes a dollar is cool. I'm in California
Have a great night! Thanks! This was fun!
